TopicTitle: Clouds appear fuzzy and low resolution on AMD GPUs

Articles.Content:
While patch 0.1.2.0 definitely brought a big improvement when it comes to clouds on AMD GPUs, they still seem to be lower resolution, fuzzier, and less defined than they are on NVIDIA GPUs, even on high settings.

KSP Version: 0.1.2.0 (Build ID: 10943457)

OS: Windows 10

CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (12) @ 3.600GHz

GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT

Edited April 15, 2023 by HopelessSoap

I think I have that same  issue with the clouds as you do  and I am always getting jealous when I see streams where the game looks a million times better than it does for me even though I play on the highest settings.

However, I have an Nvidia GPU (GeForce RTX3090). But I do also use the AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (and also still Win10)! 

Could this be an issue with that specific CPU?
